alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 31 at 4:45AM EDT until November 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT TODAY FOR SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI AND PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN ALABAMA WHILE A FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT AREA WIDE WEDNESDAY DUE TO CRITICALLY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES COMBINED WITH GUSTY NORTHERLY WINDS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR THE ENTIRE AREA... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 060, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...North 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and persistent severe to extreme drought intensity over the local area can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
